16 #define POSE_CONTROL_CLIENT_SERVER_ADDRESS "/j2s7s300_driver/pose_action/tool_pose"
17 #define JOINT_CONTROL_CLIENT_SERVER_ADDRESS "/j2s7s300_driver/joints_action/joint_angles"
18 #define POSE_CONTROL_CLIENT_SERVER_TIMEOUT 3// s
19 #define JOINT_CONTROL_CLIENT_SERVER_TIMEOUT 3// s
20 #define STANDART_VEL_CMD_TIMEOUT (0.5) // s
21 
22 // State of robots control
23 typedef enum State_{
24  VELOCITY_CONTROL,
25  POSITION_CONTROL,
26  JOINT_CONTROL,
27  STOPPED,
28  NO_STATE,
29 } State;
30 
31 kinova_msgs::PoseVelocity poseVelCmd; // Latest velocity command
32 State currentState = STOPPED; // Current State of the Robot Control
33 ros::Time poseVel_time; // time of the latest velocity command OR set to now-timeout to deactivate velocity commands.
34 ros::Duration poseVel_timeout(STANDART_VEL_CMD_TIMEOUT); // timeout for velocity commands
35 std::mutex poseVel_lock; // Lock to make all global variables thread safe
36 actionlib::SimpleActionClient<kinova_msgs::ArmPoseAction> *poseControlClient_ptr; // pointer to position control actionclient
37 actionlib::SimpleActionClient<kinova_msgs::ArmJointAnglesAction> *jointControlClient_ptr; // pointer to joint control actionclient
38 
39 
44 inline bool velCmd_upToDate(){
45  return (ros::Time::now() - poseVel_time) < poseVel_timeout;
46 }
47 
52 void poseVelocity_rawCallback(geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist){
53  poseVel_lock.lock();
54  poseVel_time = ros::Time::now();
55  poseVelCmd.twist_linear_x = twist.twist.linear.x;
56  poseVelCmd.twist_linear_y = twist.twist.linear.y;
57  poseVelCmd.twist_linear_z = twist.twist.linear.z;
58  poseVelCmd.twist_angular_x = twist.twist.angular.x;
59  poseVelCmd.twist_angular_y = twist.twist.angular.y;
60  poseVelCmd.twist_angular_z = twist.twist.angular.z;
61  if(currentState == POSITION_CONTROL || currentState==JOINT_CONTROL)
62  {
63  jointControlClient_ptr->cancelAllGoals();
64  poseControlClient_ptr->cancelAllGoals();
65  }
66  if(!poseVelCmd.twist_linear_x && !poseVelCmd.twist_linear_y && !poseVelCmd.twist_linear_z && !poseVelCmd.twist_angular_x && !poseVelCmd.twist_angular_y && !poseVelCmd.twist_angular_z)
67  currentState = STOPPED; // If all velocities are set to zero, set current State to Stopped
68  else
69  currentState = VELOCITY_CONTROL;
70  poseVel_lock.unlock();
71 }
72 
76 void goalDoneCallback(actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState state, kinova_msgs::ArmPoseResultConstPtr result){
77  poseVel_lock.lock();
78  if(currentState == POSITION_CONTROL)
79  currentState = STOPPED;
80  poseVel_lock.unlock();
81 }
82 
83 void jointGoalDoneCallback(actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState state, kinova_msgs::ArmJointAnglesActionGoal result){
84  poseVel_lock.lock();
85  if(currentState == JOINT_CONTROL)
86  currentState = STOPPED;
87  poseVel_lock.unlock();
88 }
89 
94 void poseGoal_rawCallback(geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose){
95  // Create goal to send to system
96  kinova_msgs::ArmPoseGoal goal;
97  goal.pose.header = std_msgs::Header();
98  goal.pose.header.frame_id = "j2s7s300_link_base"; // define frame to be the robot's base
99  geometry_msgs::Point pos;
100  pos.x = pose.pose.position.x;
101  pos.y = pose.pose.position.y;
102  pos.z = pose.pose.position.z;
103  geometry_msgs::Quaternion ori;
104  ori.x = pose.pose.orientation.x;
105  ori.y = pose.pose.orientation.y;
106  ori.z = pose.pose.orientation.z;
107  ori.w = pose.pose.orientation.w;
108  goal.pose.pose.position=pos;
109  goal.pose.pose.orientation=ori;
110  poseVel_lock.lock();
111  poseControlClient_ptr->sendGoal(goal, goalDoneCallback);// // send new position command
112  currentState = POSITION_CONTROL;
113  poseVel_lock.unlock();
114 }
115 
116 void jointGoal_rawCallback(kinova_msgs::ArmJointAnglesActionGoal goal){
117  // Create goal to send to system
118  goal.header = std_msgs::Header();
119  goal.header.frame_id = "j2s7s300_link_base"; // define frame to be the robot's base
120  goal.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
121  poseVel_lock.lock();
122 // jointControlClient_ptr->sendGoal(goal, jointGoalDoneCallback);// // send new joint command
123  currentState = JOINT_CONTROL;
124  poseVel_lock.unlock();
125 }
126 
131 void publishState(const ros::Publisher &status_pub){
132  static State lastState = NO_STATE;
133  const std::map<State, std::string> publishData = {
134  {VELOCITY_CONTROL, "Velocity Control"},
135  {POSITION_CONTROL, "Position Control"},
136  {JOINT_CONTROL, "Joint Control"},
137  {STOPPED, "Stopped"}
138  };
139  if(lastState != currentState){
140  lastState = currentState;
141  std_msgs::String msg;
142  msg.data = publishData.at(currentState);
143  status_pub.publish(msg);
144  }
145 }
146 
147 int main(int argc, char **argv)
148 {
149  ros::init(argc, argv, "robot_control");
150  ros::NodeHandle nh;
151 
152  ROS_INFO("Robot Control initialising");
153 
154  if(argc == 2){ // define timeout if set via function call
155  double timeout = atof(argv[1]);
156  if(timeout != 0)
157  poseVel_timeout = ros::Duration(timeout);
158  }
159 
160  actionlib::SimpleActionClient<kinova_msgs::ArmPoseAction> poseControlClient(POSE_CONTROL_CLIENT_SERVER_ADDRESS);
161  poseControlClient_ptr = &poseControlClient;
162  if(!poseControlClient.waitForServer(ros::Duration(POSE_CONTROL_CLIENT_SERVER_TIMEOUT))){
163  ROS_ERROR("Robot Control failing to connect to actionlib client for position control. Aborting");
164  return 0;
165  }
166 
167  actionlib::SimpleActionClient<kinova_msgs::ArmJointAnglesAction> jointControlClient(JOINT_CONTROL_CLIENT_SERVER_ADDRESS);
168  jointControlClient_ptr = &jointControlClient;
169  if(!jointControlClient.waitForServer(ros::Duration(JOINT_CONTROL_CLIENT_SERVER_TIMEOUT))){
170  ROS_ERROR("Robot Control failing to connect to actionlib client for joint control. Aborting");
171  return 0;
172  }
173 
174 
175  ros::Subscriber poseVel_sub = nh.subscribe("/RobotControl/VelocityControl",1, poseVelocity_rawCallback);
176  ros::Subscriber poseGoal_sub = nh.subscribe("/RobotControl/PoseControl",1, poseGoal_rawCallback);
177  ros::Subscriber jointGoal_sub = nh.subscribe("/RobotControl/JointControl",1, jointGoal_rawCallback);
178  ros::Publisher vel_cmd_pub = nh.advertise<kinova_msgs::PoseVelocity>("/j2s7s300_driver/in/cartesian_velocity",10);
179  ros::Publisher status_pub = nh.advertise<std_msgs::String>("/RobotControl/Status",1, true);
180 
181  ROS_INFO("Robot Control Running");
182  // loop at 100 hz for velocity control to kick in
183  ros::Rate loop_rate(100);
184  while(ros::ok()){
185  poseVel_lock.lock();
186  if(currentState == VELOCITY_CONTROL){
187  // don't publish old data
188  if(velCmd_upToDate()){
189  vel_cmd_pub.publish(poseVelCmd);
190  }
191  }
192  publishState(status_pub);
193  poseVel_lock.unlock();
194  // standart ros loop end
195  ros::spinOnce();
196  loop_rate.sleep();
197  }
198  ROS_INFO("Robot Control ending");
199  poseControlClient.cancelAllGoals(); // Cancel all goals so the robot does not move unchecked
200 }
